title: [Q] Are the board level and game level two different things?
body:
So, umm, the name that I see on here is my summoner name, but I can't see my match history on the website. I also am level 1 on the Boards but several times that on the game, are these two separate things? Is this account not linked to the game account? Do I even exist?

Anyway, I just got started with LoL and I thought I'd participate in the boards and with the community, unfortunately I haven't been able to do so as I can't reply to anyone nor can I up vote posts. The only thing I could do is seemingly post this, I don't know if it'll even get posted. I tried to lookup how to increase board level, can't find anything.

*Hits post and waits*

replies.body: No, they aren't. However, because they're tied together, if you hadn't used the boards for a while, your levels may fall out of sync. A discussion post like this here in H&S forces a manual sync and updates your level. It looks like your level has updated to 8, so you should be good to go now! ^.^
Thank you for clearing that up :)
